Files Headings

_baseDelay.js

 
/** Error message constants. */
var FUNC_ERROR_TEXT = 'Expected a function';

The base implementation of _.delay and _.defer which accepts args to provide to func.

Params
func Function The function to delay.
wait number The number of milliseconds to delay invocation.
args Array The arguments to provide to func. 
function baseDelay(func, wait, args) {
  if (typeof func != 'function') {
    throw new TypeError(FUNC_ERROR_TEXT);
  }
  return setTimeout(function() { func.apply(undefined, args); }, wait);
}

module.exports = baseDelay;
